column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |    1    |    2    |    3    |    4    |    5    |
| color  |         |         |         |         |         |
| city |         |         |         |         |         |
| job  |         |         |         |         |         |
| birthday |         |         |         |         |         |
| cigar  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 

There are 5 different favourite colors: blue, green, red, white, yellow
City: new-york, san-francisco, venice, prague, nizza
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: november, march, july, february, may
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: bluemaster, dunhill, pall-mall, prince, blend
The people have 5 different jobs:  nurseryman, dancer, dressmaker, nurse, librarian
1. the person traveling to new-york is the person who likes red
2. the person traveling to nizza is the dressmaker
3. the person traveling to san-francisco is the person who's birthday is in february
4. the person who likes green is on the left of the person who likes white
5. the person who likes green is the person who's birthday is in march
6. the pall-mall-smoker is the dancer
7. the person who likes yellow is the dunhill-smoker
8. the person who's birthday is in july is in the middle
9. the person traveling to prague is on the far left
10. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the nurseryman
11. the librarians is on the left or right of the dunhill-smoker
12. the bluemaster-smoker is the person who's birthday is in november
13. the person traveling to venice is the prince-smoker
14. the person traveling to prague is on the left or right of the person who likes blue
15. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the person who's birthday is in may. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
